summary: Phase 3 Mega Testing Complete - Trainer Checklists, Post-Test, Feedback, and Chief Trainer/Coordinator Feedback

ui_bugs.issue: Pre-Test and Post-Test counts show 0/15 instead of actual completed count (13/15). Backend API returns correct data (13 completed), but UI displays 0.

action_items: FIX: Coordinator Dashboard session card shows Pre-Test: 0/15 and Post-Test: 0/15 instead of actual completed counts (13/15). The backend API /api/sessions/{id}/status returns correct data.
critical_code_review_comments: Frontend session card component is not correctly displaying pre_test and post_test completion counts from the session status API
seed_data_creation: Phase 3 data created: 13 trainer checklists, 13 post-test results (12 pass, 1 fail), 13 feedback submissions, chief trainer feedback, coordinator feedback
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 3 complete. Session d664b79d-91a1-4968-bd72-de82611cdb1f has: 15 participants (13 present, 2 absent), 13 pre-tests (3 passed, 10 failed), 13 post-tests (12 passed, 1 failed - participant 5), 13 feedback submissions, chief trainer and coordinator feedback submitted. Ready for Phase 4: Certificate generation, report publishing, finance flows. NOTE: Frontend has a display bug showing 0/15 for Pre-Test and Post-Test counts.
